column13: TerryWhite Chemmart has successfully concluded its 10th annual Masterclass event, pushing the boundaries of pharmacy education and empowering over 550 pharmacists and pharmacy professionals. The event served as a platform to explore imminent changes in community pharmacy practice, workshop solutions and showcase best-in-class clinical expertise.

column13: It is in the Company's and our employees' best interests to pay everyone fairly for their contributions to our success. We recognise and reward performance via a range of terms and conditions of employment for workers covered by Enterprise or Collective Agreements and Awards. Outside of the collective agreements, the EBOS Remuneration Framework combines fair and objective assessments of job roles with objective benchmarking using salary survey data and robust pay equity reviews.

column13: EBOSÃ¢ÂÂ Work Health & Safety management system ensures strong leadership and accountability for workplace safety policies and practices. A practical risk management framework supports it. The Group Safety Committee, chaired by the CEO, develops safety initiatives and identifies areas for improvement with broad representation from business units. Each operational division reports monthly to senior management on health and safety matters. The Board receives monthly and annual reports on group-wide safety performance.

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: All work-related incidents resulting in (or with potential to) injury or ill-health of employees, contractors, visitors and public members must be logged and investigated via our dedicated Group-wide reporting system known as 'Mango'. Workplace safety coordinators have been appointed to facilitate the implementation of policies and procedures and assist with risk assessment and determination of suitable control measures.

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Our increasing network of distribution centres offers unrivalled coverage and distribution capability for health and medical products and supports the requirements of our customers. In January 2023, we opened a new 13,400m 2 Healthcare Logistics (HCL) distribution centre in Auckland with a pallet capacity 13,350. Strategically located in proximity to Auckland Airport and other HCL facilities, this 4-star Green Star-rated facility includes a range of sustainable features, including electric vehicle charging points, rainwater tanks, and motion-sensing LED lighting.

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: Symbion has demonstrated its commitment to its customers through the new Symbion Elite Rewards program, launched to the industry at the Australian Professional Pharmacy Conference in Australia at the beginning of 2023. Customers who use Symbion as their primary wholesaler and pay their statements on the rewards platform can earn points redeemable on items such as flights, groceries, fuel, and clothes or to pay other bills. The initiative is another way that Symbion is working to support pharmacy customers and thank them for their loyalty during a challenging few years in the healthcare industry.
column20: Australian Professional Pharmacy Conference, Symbion, Healthcare Industry

To mark the milestone, Red Seal made a significant addition to its line-up of products with the much anticipated and requested addition of fluoride to the brandÃ¢ÂÂs oral care range. column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: The Annual Scientific Meeting of the Neurosurgical Society of Australia (NSA) is a prominent event in the neuro and spinal surgery field in Australia. The NSA annual meeting brings together neurosurgeons, neurologists, researchers, residents, and other healthcare professionals and serves as a platform to share knowledge, discuss advancements, and promote collaboration in the field. The LifeHealthcare and LMT Spine & Neuro teams were proud to present as a combined business at the meeting held in Sydney in September 2022 under the Ã¢ÂÂShared purpose for lifeÃ¢ÂÂ theme. This conference was well attended by many customers of our previously separate businesses who were excited to see the strength of our combined portfolio on the conference stand. Technology innovations like Synaptive Modus X robotic horoscope and 7D spinal navigation were exhibited alongside a comprehensive implant portfolio.
column20: NSA Annual Meeting, LMT Spine & Neuro Teams, Synaptive Modus X Robotic Exoscope

column13: Transmedic has increased its cardiology offering by taking over Boston Scientific's cardiac rhythm business in Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, the Philippines, Indonesia, and Brunei. Twenty-five Boston Scientific employees have joined the Transmedic team under the strategic partnership.

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs

column6: Operations with local community engagement, impact assessments, and development programs
column13: The in-house manufacturing capability of the $82 million Pet Care Kitchen facility, officially opened in October 2022, has improved the supply of our premium Black Hawk kibble to retailers, enhancing our ability to meet customers' needs to provide balanced, locally sourced nutrition for their pets. Operating 24 hours a day, 5 days a week, the facility delivers commercial production rates that meet Black Hawk demand, supporting our new product development strategy and helping manage the impact of rising input costs. Onsite storage capacity has been increased substantially to safeguard against material ingredient and supply constraints and to allow for specialty blending of new products.
column20: In-House Manufacturing Capability, Pet Care Kitchen Facility, Onsite Storage Capacity
